Wow what has happened? A twentyforty rip that is over 700mb in size!?

Noticed other user dude say the quality is poor - so if you have the bandwidth, better to grab "12 Monkeys 1995 BDRip H264 AAC-SecretMyth (Kingdom-Release)" although its slightly larger.

Nice 1280x688 quality picture on that one :)

twentyforty it would be great if you would start making your rips in 1280x720 or so.

Regarding the above, while I and others appreciate these rips unfortunately due to the filesize and resolution used it means become no better than a XviD / DVD Rip.

Go on twentyforty, be ruthless, use up a few more megabytes and a 1280x720 resolution in the next rips.
twentyforty you are doing a great job, great audio/video for file size. Like the 720p but would like some movies in 1080p
